original_title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: The Old Grey Whistle Test
overview: Bob Harris presents a 1975 concert by the Southern rockers, recorded in Shepherd's Bush, London. Songs featured include Sweet Home Alabama, Every Mother's Son, Double Trouble, I Ain't the One, Call Me the Breeze, Same Old Blues and Freebird.
title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: The Old Grey Whistle Test
